message.body: I'm at the game tonight if by any chance you're going
I am planning in going - sec 126ish
Nice! I'll be in the pavilion. But I'm headed down now, so if you get there early let me know and we can meet up
Front row - 2nd seat in - white shirt -just come down and tell ##### you are here to see me and I bet she just sends you down -or I will tell you when her partner how on break and come then
Sweet! We'll probably stay up here for a bit but I'll let you know when we're coming down!
Her partner kinda a stickler and this is a hairy sec - maybe towards end or partner on break at 8:05- come then and I will move back some - That's best bet
Okay, we'll shoot for 8:05 then. Will let you know if anything changes
Cme at 8:05 - we can't sit front but. Plenty Of room - amazing view -
She says dont do it - sorry - the sec too hairy being Mets family
- may come sit with you late in game
No worries! Thanks for letting us know :-)
